summary: REQ-23 and REQ-24 appear to be implemented: the About section stats for “5+ Years Experience” and “50+ Projects Completed” are reported removed, and the footer “Built with … caffeine.ai” attribution is reported removed. However, the actual About/footer code is not visible in the truncated Sections.tsx excerpt, so verification relies on the provided file summary text.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/rewritten repository meta summaries (frontend-file-summaries and project_state) beyond the requested UI removals.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove two About stats and a footer attribution line; changes to project metadata/summaries were not requested.
